# PTD Today Year-to-Date Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top Themes
- Offshore wind turbine capacity leadership
- China’s role in power transmission and renewables
- Advances in offshore wind technology and installation

## 2) Top Stories
- In 2025, China continues to lead in single-unit offshore wind turbine capacity while Vestas’s 15 MW turbine has been installed at offshore wind farms. (Source: offshorewind.biz)

## 3) Sector Takeaways

### Renewables
- China remains dominant in offshore wind turbine single-unit capacity.
- Vestas has deployed a 15 MW offshore wind turbine, signaling advancements in turbine scale and offshore wind farm installations.
